dcterms:description: The MAHNOB-HCI dataset is designed for multimodal emotion recognition and includes 527 facial video recordings of 27 participants engaged in various tasks, capturing physiological signals such as EEG and ECG.
dcterms:title: MAHNOB-HCI

dcterms:creator: Sander Koelstra

Touradj Ebrahimi
Thierry Pun

Ioannis Patras
dcterms:description: The DEAP dataset is designed for emotion analysis using physiological signals, containing data from 32 participants who evaluated music videos for arousal and valence.
dcterms:title: DEAP
